# OpenapiClient::Error

## Properties

| Name | Type | Description | Notes |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- | ----- |
| **message** | **String** | Short description of the error. | [optional] |
| **error_code** | **String** | Platform code for the error. | [optional] |

## Example

```ruby
require 'openapi_client'

instance = OpenapiClient::Error.new(
  message: null,
  error_code: null
)
```
